description.brazilian: Conclua um nível na Cibercidade pela primeira vez
description.dutch: Voltooi een level in Cyberstad voor het eerst

description.italian: Completa un livello a Cyber City per la prima volta

description.schinese: 首次在赛博城完成关卡
description.spanish: Completa un nivel en Ciudad Cibernética por primera vez.

description.brazilian: Conclua um nível no Resort Ascendente pela primeira vez
description.dutch: Voltooi een level in Vliegend Resort voor het eerst

description.russian: Пройти уровень в «Новой надежде» первый раз
description.schinese: 首次在冉星度假村完成关卡
description.spanish: Completa un nivel en Resort Celeste por primera vez.

description.brazilian: Conclua um nível na Missão Lunar pela primeira vez
description.dutch: Voltooi een level in Maanmissie voor het eerst
description.english: Finish a level in Moon Mission for the first time

description.italian: Completa un livello a Missione Lunare per la prima volta
description.russian: Пройти уровень в лунной миссии первый раз
description.schinese: 首次在月球任务完成关卡
description.spanish: Completa un nivel en Misión Lunar por primera vez.

description.brazilian: Sobrecarregue 5 obstáculos em um nível
description.dutch: Overbelast vijf gevaren in één level
description.english: Overload five hazards in one level
description.french: Surcharge cinq dangers dans un niveau
description.german: Überlade fünf Gefahren in einem Level
description.italian: Sovraccarica cinque ostacoli in un singolo livello
description.russian: Устроить перегрузку пяти опасностей на одном уровне
description.schinese: 在一个关卡中超载五个障碍物
description.spanish: Sobrecarga cinco amenazas en un nivel.

description.brazilian: Escape do camburão no último segundo
description.dutch: Ontwijk het busje op het laatste moment
description.english: Evade the van at the last second
description.french: Échappe à la fourgonnette au dernier moment
description.german: Weiche dem Van in letzter Sekunde aus
description.italian: Evita il van all'ultimo momento
description.russian: Уклониться от фургона в последний момент
description.schinese: 在最后一秒避开抓捕车
description.spanish: Huye de la furgoneta en el último segundo.

description.brazilian: Ataque um atirador
description.dutch: Verstoor een schutter
description.french: Bloque un tireur
description.italian: Stordisci un tiratore
description.russian: Заблокировать стрелка
description.schinese: 扰乱枪手
description.spanish: Causa una disrupción a un artillero.

description.brazilian: Seja capturado pela Globacorp
description.dutch: Word gevangengenomen door Globacorp
description.french: Fais-toi capturer par Globacorp
description.italian: Fatti catturare dalla Globacorp
description.russian: Попасться Globacorp
description.schinese: 被环球集团捕获
description.spanish: Sé capturada por Globacorp.

description.brazilian: Desbloqueie o seu primeiro arsenal
description.dutch: Ontgrendel je eerste loadout
description.french: Débloque ton premier équipement
description.italian: Sblocca il tuo primo equipaggiamento
description.russian: Разблокировать первое оружие
description.schinese: 解锁第一个装备
description.spanish: Obtén tu primer equipo.

description.brazilian: Supere sua pontuação anterior em qualquer nível do modo Arcade
description.dutch: Versla je vorige score in een level in Arcademodus
description.english: Beat your previous score on any Adventure Mode level
description.french: Bats ton score précédent dans n'importe quel niveau du mode Arcade
description.german: Übertreffe deine vorherige Punktzahl in einem bel. Arcademodus-Level
description.italian: Supera il punteggio ottenuto in un livello della modalità Arcade
description.russian: Побить собственный рекорд на любом уровне в аркадном режиме
description.schinese: 在任何游乐场模式关卡中超越之前的分数
description.spanish: Supera tu puntuación anterior en un nivel del modo arcade.

displayName.brazilian: É um pássaro, é um avião...
displayName.dutch: Het is een vogel, nee een vliegtuig
displayName.english: It's A Bird, It's A Plane
displayName.german: Ist es ein Vogel? Ist es ein Flugzeug?
displayName.italian: È un aereo, è un uccello

description.brazilian: Alcance o ranque S em qualquer nível do Resort Ascendente

description.brazilian: Alcance o ranque S em qualquer nível gerado

description.brazilian: Conclua todos os níveis do Resort Ascendente no modo Arcade

description.brazilian: Conclua todos os níveis da Cibercidade no modo Arcade
description.dutch: Voltooi alle levels van Cyberstad in Arcademodus
description.english: Finish all Cyber City levels once
description.french: Termine tous les niveaux de Cyber City en mode Arcade
description.italian: Completa tutti i livelli di Cyber City in modalità Arcade

description.brazilian: Conclua todos os níveis da Missão Lunar no modo Arcade

description.english: Finish all Moon Mission levels once

description.russian: Пройти все уровни лунной миссии в аркадном режиме

description.brazilian: Colete 200 cristais em um nível

description.schinese: 在一个关卡中收集200颗水晶
description.spanish: Obtén 200 cristales en un solo nivel.

description.brazilian: Alcance o ranque S em 10 níveis gerados
description.dutch: Haal S-rang in 10 gegenereerde levels
description.french: Atteins le rang S dans 10 niveaux générés

description.schinese: 在10个生成器关卡中达到S级

description.dutch: Ontgrendel alle loadouts

description.italian: Sblocca tutti gli equipaggiamenti

description.spanish: Desbloquea todos los equipos.

description.brazilian: Conclua todos os níveis do modo Arcade no ranque A ou superior
description.dutch: Voltooi elk level in Arcademodus met rang A of hoger
description.english: Finish every level with an A rank or higher
description.french: Termine chaque niveau du mode Arcade au rang A ou supérieur

description.italian: Completa ogni livello della modalità Arcade con grado A o superiore
description.russian: Пройти с рейтингом A или выше все уровни в аркадном режиме
description.schinese: 完成每个游乐场模式且达到A级或更高
description.spanish: Logra un rango A o más en todos los niveles del modo arcade.

description.brazilian: Conclua todos os níveis do modo Arcade no ranque S ou superior
description.dutch: Voltooi elk level in Arcademodus met rang S of hoger
description.english: Finish every level with an S rank

description.german: Beende jedes Arcademodus-Level auf S-Rang oder höher

description.russian: Пройти с рейтингом S или выше все уровни в аркадном режиме
description.schinese: 完成每个游乐场模式且达到S级或更高
description.spanish: Logra un rango S o más en los niveles del modo arcade.

description.brazilian: Conclua um nível gerado em menos de 1:40
description.dutch: Voltooi een gegenereerd level in minder dan 1:40

description.spanish: Termina un nivel generado en menos de 1:40.

description.brazilian: Alcance o ranque 8 de corredor
description.dutch: Bereik rennerrang 8
description.french: Atteins le niveau de coureuse 8

description.russian: Достичь рейтинга бегуна 8
description.schinese: 达到跑者第8级
description.spanish: Alcanza el nivel 8 de corredora.

description.brazilian: Colete um total de 10.000 cristais
description.dutch: Verzamel in totaal 10.000 kristallen
description.french: Obtiens un total de 10 000 cristaux

description.russian: Собрать 10 000 кристаллов
description.schinese: 共收集10,000颗水晶
description.spanish: Obtén un total de 10 000 cristales.

description.brazilian: Escape com sucesso da Globacorp
description.dutch: Ontsnap met succes aan Globacorp
description.french: Échappe à Globacorp
description.italian: Semina la Globacorp con successo
description.russian: Сбежать из Globacorp
description.schinese: 成功逃离环球集团
description.spanish: Huye con éxito de Globacorp.
